bonus.name: Elite Recovery (Bloodied Only)
entries: The treant ends one negative effect currently affecting it. It can use this bonus action as long as it has at least 1 hit point, even while {@condition unconscious} or {@condition incapacitated}.

bonus.name: Heat Mirage (Summer)
entries: The treant seems to shimmer and blur, increasing its AC by 1 until the start of its next turn. In addition, any creature within 10 feet that can see the treant makes a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or is {@condition confused|LevelUp} until the start of its next turn. A creature that succeeds on its saving throw is immune to the treant's Heat Mirage confusion effect for 24 hours.

bonus.name: Leaf Drop (Fall)
entries: The treant sheds a flurry of leaves or needles, creating a heavily obscured area within 15 feet until the start of its next turn.

bonus.name: Limb Sweep (Bloodied Only)
entries: The treant makes a slam attack against each creature within 10 feet. A creature hit by an attack makes a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw, falling {@condition prone} on a failure.

bonus.name: Root (Bloodied Only, 1/Day)
entries: The treant sends roots deep into the earth to bolster itself with nutrients and water. It immediately gains 70 temporary hit points, and becomes rooted. While rooted the treant cannot be shoved or knocked {@condition prone}, its Speed is 0, it gains resistance to fire damage, and can extinguish itself as a reaction to taking fire damage. The treant can end the rooted condition as an action, losing any remaining temporary hit points.

bonus.name: Trample (Bloodied Only)
entries: The treant moves up to its Speed in a straight line. It can move through the spaces of Large and smaller creatures. Each of these creatures make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and falling {@condition prone} on a failure.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The limpocait has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The limpocait can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The limpocait can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Unsettling Form
entries: After this amorphous off-white blob is damaged by a creature, on its turn the limpocait's jelly-like body transforms to match its attacker's form. If attacked by a humanoid it rises up with a torso that grows two limbs, if attacked by a giant spider it becomes a mass with eight tentacles, and so on. This transformation does not change the limpocait's statistics but it is a startling psionic response that throws attackers off balance, and the attacker has disadvantage on attacks made against the limpocait until it uses Unsettling Form against another creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The limpocait attacks twice with its slam.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) magical bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) force damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage.
If the target is a metal or stone object that isn't being worn or carried,  1-foot cube of it is destroyed.

If the target is a metal or stone object being wielded by a creature, the creature makes a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls (destroyed if the penalty drops to -5).

If the target is a creature that is wearing metal armour or with a metal shield donned, it takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC offered by its armour and shield. Armour reduced to an AC of 10 or a shield that drops to a +0 bonus is destroyed.

reaction.name: Split
entries: When a limpocait that is Medium or larger is subjected to psychic or slashing damage, it splits into two new limpocaits if it has at least 10 hit points. Each new limpocait has hit points equal to half the original limpocait's. New limpocaits are one size smaller than the original limpocait.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the huntmaster's darkvision.

trait.name: Master of the Pack
entries: The huntmaster has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one {@creature hell hound|LevelUp} is within 5 feet of the creature and the hell hound isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Relentless Hunter
entries: The huntmaster has advantage on checks made to find or follow tracks.

trait.name: Quarry
entries: The huntmaster can choose a quarry given to it by another creature (usually a fiend). After choosing a quarry, the huntmaster cannot choose another quarry until it obtains the quarry's soul or it is slain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The huntmaster attacks twice with its spear and once with its bite, or it makes two attacks with its bow.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) piercing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the huntmaster can't use its bite on another target.

action.name: Soul Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) psychic damage.

action.name: Blood Bow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) piercing damage. The target and each creature within 5 feet makes a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or takes 4 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage from the scattered blood droplets that fall from the arrow.

action.name: Call Hounds (3/Day)
entries: The huntmaster summons {@dice 1d4} {@creature hell hound|LevelUp|hell hounds}. Summoned hounds appear in unoccupied spaces within 60 feet of the huntmaster, whom they obey without question. The summoned hounds remain for 1 minute, until they or the huntmaster dies, or until the huntmaster takes a bonus action to dismiss them.

action.name: Houndsight
entries: The huntmaster sees and hears using the senses of a {@creature hell hound|LevelUp} within 1 mile until the start of its next turn. During that time, it is {@condition deafened} and {@condition blinded} with regard to its own senses.

reaction.name: No Escape
entries: When its quarry provokes an opportunity attack the huntmaster makes two attacks.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The shadowspinner's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 16}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

3e: {@spell symbol|LevelUp} (the symbol is visible and incorporated into web)

trait.name: Chaotic
entries: The shadowspinner radiates a Chaotic aura.

trait.name: Ethereal Sight
entries: The shadowspinner can see into both the Material and Ethereal Veil.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: When the shadowspinner fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does so, one of its eight eyes becomes dull. Roll {@dice d8} on the list of Eye Beam secondary effects. Targets automatically succeed on saving throws against that effect.

trait.name: Shapeshift
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the shadowspinner changes its form to that of any Small, Medium, or Large humanoid or weaverkin creature it has seen before, or back into its true form. While shapeshifted, its statistics are the same. While in humanoid form, it can't use its claw attack. Any equipment is not transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The shadowspinner can climb even on difficult surfaces and upside down on ceilings.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The shadowspinner ignores movement restrictions imposed by webs.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shadowspinner makes four claw attacks. It can replace any claw attack with an eye beam.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) slashing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 18}).

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target {@condition grappled} by the shadowspinner. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage plus 17 ({@damage 5d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Eye Beam
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 10} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be subjected to one of the following randomly chosen secondary effects:

items.name: 1. Darken Eyes
entries: The target is {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn.

items.name: 2. Extinguish Spark
entries: The target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage. Within 30 feet, all nonmagical fires are magically extinguished, and 2nd-level or lower spells are dispelled if they create magical light that overlaps with the area.

items.name: 3. Faerie Light
entries: For one minute, the target magically sheds dim blue light in a 5-foot radius. While the target is glowing, attacks against it are made with advantage by creatures that can see it.

items.name: 4. Latent Command
entries: The target is magically cursed by the shadowspinner for 24 hours. As a bonus action, the shadowspinner can end the effect early on a creature within 30 feet by giving a telepathic order. The creature uses its reaction to take an action chosen by the shadowspinner.

items.name: 5. Shadow Self
entries: The shadowspinner magically summons a {@creature shadow|LevelUp} within 5 feet of the target. The shadow is under the shadowspinner's control and acts after the shadowspinner's turn.

items.name: 6. Shadow Switch
entries: If there is space to do so and both the shadowspinner and the target are in dim light or darkness, the shadowspinner can cause the shadowspinner and the target to magically teleport, swapping places.

items.name: 7. Shadow Tendrils
entries: If the target is in dim light or darkness, it is {@condition restrained} by threads made of shadow for 1 minute or until it is in an area of bright light. As an action, it can free itself by succeeding on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw, ending the effect.

items.name: 8. Sow Suspicion
entries: The target magically gains a level of {@condition Strife|LevelUp}. Until the target has no levels of {@condition Strife|LevelUp}, whenever the target uses magic or the Insight skill to determine if a creature is lying, it believes that the creature is lying.

action.name: Ethereal Web (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The shadowspinner releases ethereal silk in a 60-foot cone. The area is filled with ethereal webs (see Planestrider's Journal).

legendary.name: Eye Beam
entries: The shadowspinner uses Eye Beam.

legendary.name: Focused Eye Beam (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The shadowspinner uses Eye Beam. On a hit, it chooses the secondary effect instead of rolling it randomly.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Belagon has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Evil
entries: Belagon radiates an Evil aura.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Belagon makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}42 ({@damage 9d6 + 11}) slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it makes a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw. On a failure, it is pushed up to 10 feet away from Belagon and knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}63 ({@damage 15d6 + 11}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it makes a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw, falling {@condition prone} on a failure.

action.name: Sword Sweep (1/Day, While Bloodied)
entries: Belagon makes a greatsword attack aainst each creature within 10 feet.

action.name: Fire Breath (1/Day)
entries: Belagon exhales a blast of fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area makes a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 42 ({@damage 9d6 + 11}) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success. A creature that fails the saving throw also takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) ongoing fire damage. A creature can use an action to end the ongoing damage.

bonus.name: Elite Recovery
entries: Belagon ends one negative effect currently affecting it. It can use this bonus action as long as it has at least 1 hit point, even while {@condition unconscious} or {@condition incapacitated}.

reaction.name: Kick
entries: When hit by a melee attack by a Medium or smaller creature Belagon can see within 10 feet, Belagon kicks its attacker. The attacker makes a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, it takes 25 ({@damage 4d4 + 15}) bludgeoning damage, is pushed up to 20 feet from Belagon, and falls {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Hungry Hungry Hyperopia
entries: Until it is bloodied, the larva takes no notice of Medium or smaller creatures, focusing on perceiving only planar material which it seeks always to devour.

trait.name: Inertia in Motion
entries: The larva's movement is difficult to stop, slow, or alter unless the larva so chooses. It has advantage on saving throws to avoid being {@condition staggered|LevelUp}, {@condition petrified}, {@condition restrained}, or {@condition debilitated|LevelUp}.

action.name: Devour Detritus
entries: The larva opens its mouth and moves 5 feet forward, consuming a 5-foot sphere of planar material in the process. Nonmagical objects and creations of magical force in the area that are Medium-sized or smaller are automatically disintegrated. Larger objects and creations of magical force have a 5-foot-sphere portion disintegrated instead. Magic items are unaffected and pass through the larva's digestive system after {@dice 1d4} hours. A creature in the area makes a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or takes {@damage 5d6 + 10} force damage. A creature reduced to 0 hit points is obliterated along with anything it was wearing or carrying (except magic items), leaving nothing behind but fine dust. Only {@spell true resurrection|LevelUp} or a {@spell wish|LevelUp} spell can restore it to life.

bonus.name: Harden Carapace (While Bloodied, 3/Day)
entries: The detritivore gains 10 temporary hit points at the end of its turn.

bonus.name: Quick Chomp (While Bloodied)
entries: The larva uses Devour Detritus.

reaction.name: Barrier Breaker
entries: When the larva's movement would be stopped by a solid object it makes an Athletics check to push magical or physical barriers aside (or break through them if they do not move).

trait.name: Smoke Form
entries: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. In addition, the elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. If the elemental ends its turn in another creature's space, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or suffer a level of {@condition fatigue|LevelUp}. In areas obscured by smoke, mist, or steam the elemental is {@condition invisible}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elemental uses Gripping Smoke and makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Gripping Smoke
entries: Each creature in the elemental's space makes a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or becomes {@condition grappled} and {@condition restrained} (escape {@dc 18}).

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The emperor is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 19}, +11 to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: When the emperor fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead. When it does so, one of its usually invisible other heads becomes visible.

trait.name: Overwhelmingly Lawful
entries: The emperor radiates a potent Lawful aura. When a Chaotic creature starts its turn within 20 feet of the emperor or first enters into that area, it makes a {@dc 19} Charisma saving throw or becomes {@condition rattled|LevelUp} until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Reactive Heads
entries: The emperor can take three reactions per round, but not more than one per turn.

trait.name: Triumvirate
entries: The emperor has advantage on Perception checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, or knocked {@condition unconscious}. When casting a spell that requires concentration the emperor chooses one head that is not already concentrating on a spell to do so, and whenever the emperor takes damage only one head (its choice) makes a Constitution saving throw to maintain concentration on a spell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The emperor attacks three times. It can replace any attack with the casting of a spell of 3rd-level or lower, or replace two attacks with the casting of a spell of any level.

action.name: Fist of Law
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d8 + 2}) magical bludgeoning damage.

bonus.name: Draw Arcana (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The emperor expends up to 12 hit dice, regaining spell slots of a total level equal to half the number of expended hit dice.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The emperor makes an attack.

legendary.name: Cast Spell (Costs 1 to 3 Actions)
entries: The emperor casts a spell of up to 3rd level. Each spell level costs 1 legendary action.

legendary.name: Threadwalker (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The emperor teleports to an unoccupied 5-foot square within 20 feet of it but provokes opportunity attacks as if it used its movement instead. Any other attacks or effects that affected the emperor since the start of the last turn no longer affect it unless they would also have affected the emperor in its new location. For example, if the emperor had taken 23 poison damage and been {@condition poisoned} by a breath weapon but its new location was not in the area of the breath weapon, it regains those hit points and is not {@condition poisoned}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The noble's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The noble has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Fungal Weaponry
entries: The noble's weapon attacks are magical, and it deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage and 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage with weapon attacks (included below).

trait.name: Glamered
entries: The noble appears to be a normal humanoid until it is bloodied, smells an overwhelming odor of garlic or vinegar, or is infuriated by a successful Persuasion check opposed by its Insight check.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The noble has advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: When the noble fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The noble attacks four times, or it casts a spell and attacks twice.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) magical bludgeoning damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage and 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Exploding Spore
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 40/80 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) force damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage and 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

bonus.name: Disruptive Odour (Jack Only)
entries: The noble emits a fetid scent in a 60-foot radius. Each non-plant creature in the area makes a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or becomes {@condition rattled|LevelUp} until the end of the noble's next turn.

bonus.name: Slothful Scent (Queen Only)
entries: The noble emits a soporific odour in a 20-foot radius. Each non-plant creature in the area makes a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or becomes {@condition slowed|LevelUp} until the end of the noble's next turn.

bonus.name: Debilitating Spray (King Only)
entries: The noble blasts a potent aroma in a 5-foot radius. Each non-plant creature in the area makes a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or becomes {@condition debilitated|LevelUp} until the start of the noble's next turn.

reaction.name: Bewildering Mist (3/Day)
entries: When a creature damages the noble with a melee attack, it emits a burst of gas at its attacker. The creature makes a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw or it becomes {@condition confused|LevelUp} for 1 minute. At the end of each of its turns, a {@condition confused|LevelUp} creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the condition on itself on a success.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The noble makes an attack.

legendary.name: Sapping Spores (Jack Only)
entries: The noble flings out sticky spores that explode with magical sap in a 15-foot cone. Creatures in the area make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or become covered in sap. While covered in sap, a creature can't cast spells with seen components, drop an object it is holding, or pick up a new object until a bonus action is spent scraping the sap away.

legendary.name: Spell (Queen Only)
entries: The noble casts a spell.

legendary.name: Trapping Shroom (King Only)
entries: A creature the noble can see makes a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or becomes {@condition restrained} by a mushroom (AC 14, 20 hit points) that suddenly grows up and around it.

legendary.name: Royal Aroma (Costs 2 Actions; Bloodied Only)
entries: The noble uses Disruptive Odour, Slothful Scent, or Debilitating Spray.

legendary.name: Royal Plea (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The noble casts {@spell calm emotions|LevelUp}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The noble's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 17}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The noble has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Glamered
entries: Until it is bloodied or infuriated by a successful Intimidation check opposed by its Insight check, the noble appear to be a normal humanoid.

trait.name: Undead Nature
entries: The noble doesn't require air, sustenance, or sleep.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: When the noble fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Ostium Master
entries: WHen the noble casts {@spell command|LevelUp} it is able to target undead with the spell, and when it casts {@spell move earth|LevelUp} it can affect any building material such as metal, stone, and wood.

trait.name: Royal Annoyance
entries: After a creature has succeeded on a saving throw against a {@spell command|LevelUp} from the noble, it has advantage on saving throws against the noble's {@spell command|LevelUp} spell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The noble attack four times.

action.name: Royal Halberd (Jack Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) magical piercing or slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) force damage.

action.name: Royal Wave (Queen Only)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) force damage.

action.name: Royal Sceptre (King Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) magical bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) force damage.

reaction.name: Royal Reprisal (Recharge 5-6)
entries: When the noble is damaged by a creature it can target the creature with a {@spell command|LevelUp} spell.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The noble makes a melee attack.

legendary.name: Royal Illusion
entries: The noble casts {@spell mirror image|LevelUp}.

legendary.name: Royal Mind (King Only)
entries: The noble casts {@spell detect thoughts|LevelUp} or {@spell major image|LevelUp}.

legendary.name: Royal Weapon
entries: The noble attacks with a magical weapon it has already conjured (either an {@spell arcane sword|LevelUp} or {@spell spiritual weapon|LevelUp}.

legendary.name: Spell (Queen Only)
entries: The noble casts a spell.

legendary.name: Step Lightly (Jack Only)
entries: The noble moves its Speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Royal Body (King Only; Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The noble regains 16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) hit points.

legendary.name: Royal Command (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The noble casts {@spell command|LevelUp} and its target has disadvantage on the saving throw.

trait.name: Storm Form
entries: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. In addition, the elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) lightning and 5 ({@damage 1d10}) thunder damage. Any creature which ends its turn in the same space as the elemental takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) lightning and 5 ({@damage 1d10}) thunder damage at the end of its turn.

trait.name: Storming
entries: A creature that touches the elemental or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) thunder damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elemental uses Blinding Thunder and makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) slashing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) lightning and 5 ({@damage 1d10}) thunder damage.

action.name: Blinding Thunder
entries: Each creature in the elemental's space makes a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or becomes {@condition blinded} and {@condition deafened} until the end of the elemental's next turn.

action.name: Lightning Strike (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The elemental creates a lightning bolt which strikes a point it can see within 500 feet. Each creature within 10 feet of that point makes a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 63 ({@damage 14d8}) lightning damage on a failure, or half damage on a success.

trait.name: Lit
entries: The elemental sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius and dim light in an additional 60 feet.

trait.name: Magma Form
entries: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the elemental or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) fire damage. In addition, the elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) fire damage. The space the elemental occupies is difficult terrain for other creatures. A creature which ends its turn in the same space as the elemental takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) fire damage.

trait.name: Magma Movement
entries: The elemental can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the elemental leaves a fiery tunnel in its wake.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Water Susceptibility
entries: The elemental takes 1 cold damage for every 5 feet it moves in water or for every gallon of water splashed on it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elemental makes two slam attacks or one slam and one magma hurl attack.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 6d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage and if the target is a creature it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}). A creature {@condition grappled} in this way is {@condition restrained} and damaged by the elemental's Magma Form. The elemental can grapple 1 Huge, 2 Large, or 8 Medium or smaller creatures at one time.

action.name: Magma Hurl
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}33 ({@damage 4d12 + 7}) fire damage and if the target is a creature it is {@condition grappled} and {@condition restrained} by magma (escape {@dc 20}) that deals 16 ({@damage 3d10}) ongoing fire damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The noble's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 17}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The noble has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Disturbing Humour
entries: When casting {@spell hideous laughter|LevelUp} the noble can target any creature regardless of Intelligence score or concentrate on the spell (included below). In addition, the noble has disadvantage on saving throws it makes against {@spell hideous laughter|LevelUp}.

trait.name: Glamered
entries: The noble appears to be a normal humanoid until it is bloodied or incites laughter by making a successful Performance check opposed by an Intimidation check from a creature able to hear or see it.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: When the noble fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The noble casts a spell and attacks twice.

action.name: Royal Halberd (Jack Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) magical piercing or slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) psychic damage.

action.name: Royal Wave (Queen Only)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) psychic damage.

action.name: Royal Sceptre (King Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) magical bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage.

bonus.name: Crack Wise
entries: The noble casts {@spell hideous laughter|LevelUp}.

reaction.name: Royal Pratfall
entries: After taking damage the noble casts {@spell misty step|LevelUp}.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The noble makes a melee attack.

legendary.name: Quick Joke
entries: The noble casts {@spell hideous laughter|LevelUp}.

legendary.name: Royal Mind (King Only)
entries: The noble casts {@spell detect thoughts|LevelUp} or {@spell searing equation|LevelUp}.

legendary.name: Spell (Queen Only)
entries: The noble casts a spell of 5th-level or lower.

legendary.name: Step Lightly (Jack Only)
entries: The nobles moves its Speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Royal Siphon (King Only; Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The noble chooses a creature it can see within 60 feet. The creature must make a {@dc 17} Intelligence saving throw or take 26 ({@damage 4d12}) psychic damage. The noble regains hit points equal to half the damage dealt.

legendary.name: Royal Joke (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The noble casts {@spell hideous laughter|LevelUp} and its target has disadvantage on the saving throw.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The noble's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The noble has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Bloodtracker
entries: After damaging a living creature the noble knows the direction and distance to it as long as they are on the same plane of existence.

trait.name: Glamered
entries: The noble appears to be a normal humanoid until it is bloodied, damages a bloodied creature, or is infuriated by a successful Stealth check opposed by its Perception check.

trait.name: Combat Expertise
entries: The damage of the noble's attacks includes a {@dice d8} expertise die (included below).

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: When the noble fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The noble attacks four times.

action.name: Ram (Bloodied Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 1d12 + 1d8 + 5}) magical bludgeoning damage and the target makes a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Royal Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) magical slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) thunder damage.

action.name: Royal Sceptre (King Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 1d4 + 5}) magical bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) thunder damage.

bonus.name: Heart's Desire (Recharge 4-6)
entries: The noble chooses a creature it can see within 60 feet. The creature must make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or become distracted as it suddenly feels despair regarding what it desires most. The noble gains advantage on its attacks against the distracted creature until the end of the noble's turn or until it misses with an attack roll.

reaction.name: Cardiac Surge
entries: When the noble scores a critical hit against a living creature, it regains an amount of hit points equal to the half the damage dealt as it draws the blood into itself.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The noble makes a melee attack.

legendary.name: Royal Tentacle (Bloodied Only)
entries: The noble uses the {@spell Disarm|LevelUp} or {@spell Knockdown|LevelUp} maneuver, and the saving throw against it cannot gain advantage or any expertise die.

legendary.name: Seek Heart
entries: The noble casts {@spell true strike|LevelUp}.

legendary.name: Spell (Queen Only)
entries: The noble casts a spell.

legendary.name: Step Lightly (Jack Only)
entries: The noble moves its Speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Royal Rage (King Only; Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The noble becomes infuriated and bolsters itself with rage, taking half damage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Oblivious Labourer
entries: Until it is bloodied, the detritivore takes no notice of Large or smaller creatures, focusing on perceiving only planar material (whether breaking it down or stitching it together).
In addition, the detritivore gains 50 temporary hit points when it rolls initiative.

trait.name: Planar Threading
entries: The detritivore's silk binds disparate planes together in a seamless and inexplicable manner. A creature that comes into contact with the silk in its raw form makes a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw or also becomes temporarily bound to and cannot leave the Gyre by any means for 24 hours.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The detritivore regains 30 hit points at the start of its turn. If the detritivore takes psychic damage, this trait doesn't function on its next turn. The detritivore dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Unstoppable Force
entries: The detritivore's movement cannot be stopped, slowed, or altered unless the detritivore so chooses. It pushes magical or physical barriers aside or breaks through them (if they do not move) on contact.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The detritivore attacks once with its bite and twice with its talons.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 4d8 + 8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Disintegrate Detritus
entries: The detritivore opens its mouth, expelling a pale ray in a 90-foot long and 15-foot wide line that automatically disintegrates any nonmagical objects and creations of magical force in the area that are Gargantuan-sized or smaller. Larger objects and creations of magical force have a cylindrical portion disintegrated instead. Magic items are unaffected. A creature in the area makes a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or takes 75 ({@damage 10d6 + 40}) force damage and is pushed out of the area. A creature reduced to 0 hit points is obliterated along with anything it was wearing or carrying (except magic items), leaving nothing behind but fine dust. Only {@spell true resurrection|LevelUp} or a {@spell wish|LevelUp} spell can restore it to life.

action.name: Web (Recharge 4-6)
entries: The detritivore shoots out webbed silk that fills a 20-foot square within 100 feet and turns it into difficult terrain. Each creature in the area makes a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or becomes {@condition grappled} and {@condition restrained} by the web (escape {@dc 16}).

reaction.name: Reactive Ray (While Bloodied)
entries: When a creature within range hits the detritivore, the detritivore uses Disintegrate Detritus against it.
